medium: Silk gauze brocade with supplementary weft designs
title: Chinese Woman's Chi-Fu Robe
description: semi-sheer fabric of red woven with gold dragons, clouds and smoke in pastel colors; diagonal lines woven on coat tails in red and pastels; cuff and collar trim of gold and black floral brocade and blue, gold, green, pink cloud design woven fabric
creditline: Gift of Dr. Markle and Charlotte Karlen
